name: Alec Bradley - Gold Crown - Robusto
additionalNotes: Alec Bradley Gold Crown Robusto Connecticut cigars (5" x 50) are made by the same crew who brought you award winners like the Prensado, Sanctum, and Coyol, only these are priced MUCH lower as everyday smokes. Combo fillers are hand-rolled into a golden Connecticut wrapper creating a smooth to medium body flavor profile that you won't believe is selling for so cheap.
